channel.title: A couple of questions about Whonix torrents
channel.description:
1. Who exactly is in charge of making and distributing the Whonix torrents?
2. What's the reasoning behind the tracker choice?

item.title: A couple of questions about Whonix torrents
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
SuchAnonymity:

1. Who exactly is in charge of making and distributing the Whonix torrents?

I am.

SuchAnonymity:

2. What’s the reasoning behind the tracker choice?

Didn’t give this much thought. Inspired by https://github.com/moba/createtortorrents/blob/master/createtorrents.sh. Used a non-UDP one that worked reliably.

Read full topic
item.source: A couple of questions about Whonix torrents
